meanings.sent1: The audile music filled the room with beautiful sounds.
meanings.sent2: The birds chirping outside are audile signals of the morning.
meanings.sent3: The audile alarm clock woke me up with its loud ringing.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was an audile reminder of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The baby's laughter was an audile delight to everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: A person who is able to hear.
meanings.sent1: The audile enjoyed listening to the music at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The audile could hear the distant train whistle clearly.
meanings.sent3: The audile in the movie theater shushed the noisy viewers.
meanings.sent4: The audile's ears perked up at the sound of their favorite song.
meanings.sent5: The audile's ability to hear whispers amazed their friends.
